description:
STUDENT REVIEW:

A great introduction to the world of info-products!

"Dave takes you through the basics of what it takes to be a succesful infopreneur in this excellent course.

You'll be left with plenty of valuable information to those of you who are just starting out in this business. Truly inspirational stuff!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Infopreneur Secrets walks you through the exciting world of creating and selling Info-products â€“ by someone who has sold $140 Million of his own information products!

From Wikipedia:

Infopreneur is a person whose primary business is gathering and selling electronic information. This term is a neologism portmanteau derived from the words "information" and "entrepreneur". An infopreneur is generally considered an entrepreneur who makes money selling information on the Internet.

If you have knowledge or experience that helps people:

A. Solve a problem

B. Save time

C. Enjoy life more

D. Learn how to do something they are interested in learning

...then you have the makings of a successful Info-product and you can make money by creating and selling your knowledge and expertise!

The benefits of being an Infopreneur are too many to list here, but here are just a few:

  • Making a difference in people's lives through your experience & knowledge
  • Creating multiple streams of passive income
  • Enjoying the freedom that residual income gives you
  • Building an audience that you can help with additional info-products you create
  • Offering other people's related products to your audience (as an affiliate) for additional income

And you know what? Becoming an Infopreneur is NOT a difficult thing to do...

But you do need a roadmap - a system that shows you the steps to getting there. That's what you will get in this course.

You'll discover a simple system for success in ANY Info-product niche so that you can be off and running with your very own Info-product.

You'll also receive a lecture on the power of Udemy and how this simple learning platform is about to explode with new users, making it a powerful marketing mechanism in its own right.

Now, right about this time, people start to disqualify themselves by saying:

"I'm not an Author, I could barely get through English class in school!"

or

"Who am I kidding, I'm not an expert on anything..."

or

"Being an Infopreneur / Author is for other people - 'stars' - 'type A people' - or 'smart people'..."

Nothing could be further from the truth...

If I believed those things about myself, I would've never written my first eBook, which turned into a $3,000 a month income...

And which then led to my Infomercial which made me millions!

(And trust me, I was no "A student" in school!)

If you have these doubts about yourself, it just means you're human... But don't let that doubt sway you into believing that the Infopreneur lifestyle is NOT for you - it is.

One of the greatest feelings in the world is waking up and checking your email to see that, overnight, your website sold several copies of your eBook, video course or other Info-product - while you were sleeping...

And, knowing that your products are helping people is an even better feeling!

You'll discover the exciting world of the Infopreneur and learn about:

  • Sales funnels (Front end products, Upsells, Downsells, Backend products, Continuity products, membership sites, etc.)
  • The various formats for Infoproducts
  • Some of my Infoproducts and what I learned from each one
  • And a lot more...

You have nothing to lose and a whole new world to gain, so check out this course and learn from someone who has actually made millions by creating and marketing his own Information Products!
title: Basics Of Selling Information Products & Online Courses
